summary: I noticed in my Firefox that some descriptions had a video that do not load so I opened it in IE and it was not working there either.
descriptionHtml:
I noticed in my Firefox that some descriptions had a video that do not load so I opened it in IE and it was not working there either. so I made this upload to test things and foud out that
1) code like this works in the description of a mod at nexusmods
[\"youtube\"]the id number only[\"/youtube\"] but without the \" \" \" 
Got that info here [url=https://www.vbulletin.com/forum/showthread.php/199304-How-To-Make-a-YouTube-BB-Code]How To Make a YouTube BB Code[/url]

this will not work in a description here [code][media]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O3Dq09ZWSgg[/media] [/code]

2) When adding a video to a mod with the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/members/managefiles.php]Manage your files[/url]>>[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/members/managevideos.php?id=12724]Videos[/url]>>[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/members/addvideo.php?id=12724]add a video[/url] feature it is important to use the correct type of link just like the 
[img]http://img805.imageshack.us/img805/2674/likethiscu.jpg[/img]
author: NA
